tabs.title: Tabs
tabs.subtitle: Tab component for organizing content into separate panels. Supports horizontal and vertical orientation, scrolling, lazy loading and customization

basic.title: Basic Example
basic.description: Basic usage of tabs component with three content panels

vertical.title: Vertical Orientation
vertical.description: Tabs can be displayed vertically using `orientation="vertical"` property

dynamic.title: Dynamic Tabs
dynamic.description: Creating tabs dynamically using `v-for` and reactive data

template.title: Custom Templates
template.description: Using slots to create custom content for tabs and panels

controlled.title: Controlled Tabs
controlled.description: Full control over tabs state using `v-model` and event handlers

scrollable.title: Scrollable Tabs
scrollable.description: Tabs with navigation buttons for scrolling when there are many elements

disabled.title: Disabled Tabs
disabled.description: Individual tabs can be disabled using `disabled` property

navigation.title: Navigation Menu
navigation.description: Navigation menu implemented using tabs without panels. Tab content can use, for example, router-view

argTypes.updatevalue: Event for updating active tab value
argTypes.nexticon: Template for "Next" button icon for scrollable component
argTypes.previcon: Template for "Previous" button icon for scrollable component
